Why itâ€™s a highlight:

I wrote up this post quickly after the Masters Tournament ended. Akins had been featured prominently on TV and I saw no other publication in the world had done a direct â€œWho is Angela Akinsâ€ story.

Using content from our sister paper, the Austin-American Statesman, I wrote a story highly optimized for search. It saw massive traffic and was the most popular page on ajc.com for the next two days.
